title: PVC Trim has quickly gained wide acceptance in the building community due to the fact that unlike some...

attachments.displayName:
PVC Trim has quickly gained wide acceptance in the building community due to the fact that unlike some wood species, PVC trim materials resist rot and insect infestation and they look clean and crisp with minimal maintenance year after year. For that reason, Boston Cedar is proud to introduce a great new offering to its product roster named White Gold PVC Trim.

http://www.bostoncedar.com/white_gold/white_gold.html

object.content:

For that reason, Boston Cedar is proud to introduce a great new offering to its product roster named White Gold PVC Trim.
